resources.string: Have you travelled from Mainland China/Iran/South Korea/ Italy / other high burden country of COVID-19 infection in the last 14 days?
Have you had close contact with any person , who has returned from Mainland China/Iran/South Korea/ Italy / other high burden country of COVID-19 infection in the last 14 days?
Have you had close contact with a probable or confirmed case of COVID-19 in the last 14 days?
Are you currently living with someone who was identified as a probable or confirmed case of COVID-19 within the last 14 days?
Do you have a sore throat?
Do you have shortness of breath?

* This app will anonymously collect the data you provide. No personally identifiable information will be requested or collected. The data may be analyzed or shared with third parties for research purposes.
I agree with the Terms and condition
Your Risk score is %d you have a chance for development of COVID -19. Further, you need medical assistance, please visit the following designated hospitals for further medical workup.
There is no indication that you are currently infected by COVID-19
Isolate yourself in a separate room of your home and limit your movement there
Keep items of your personal use separate from other family members
Use a mask 24 hours and change it when it becomes soaked or dirty
Wash your hands with water and soap regularly for at least 20 seconds
----- Or you can contact any of the given helplines anytime -----
Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds especially after you have been in a public place, or after blowing your nose, coughing, or sneezing.
Avoid close contact with people who are sick
If you are sick: You should wear a facemask when you are around other people (e.g., sharing a room or vehicle) and before you enter a healthcare providerâ€™s office.
This is a screening tool and not a diagnostic test. Please consult a doctor for diagnosis.
